meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6996.

td.p: Colin O'Grady, a high school English teacher from Alexandria, Virginia
Erin McLaughlin, a fifth grade teacher from Queens, New York
Martha Jackson, a high school math teacher from Tabor, Iowa

tr.td: "C" YOU AT THE MOVIES
TEXT TALK
IN THE STATE CAPITAL
RECENT NONFICTION
KEEP CALM
CARRY ON

Erin

STRIKE IT "RICH"
